name: 𝘚𝘏𝘐𝘍𝘛 𝘙𝘜𝘕𝘕𝘌𝘙
description:
If You Find Yourself Lost :  

https://streamable.com/xy19px (lv1)

https://streamable.com/5d8vno (lv2)

https://streamable.com/f6u97r (lv3)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Keys:
F1 = Restart

Tab = Show Leaderboard(realtime)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Plot: Shift Runner is a game where you shift dimensions to find your way through the levels. The objective is to achieve a high placement on the leaderboards by running the levels over and over again until you perfect your time. Each level is short, but requires precision and skill to complete. The challenge is not just to finish the level, but to do it in the fastest time possible.

This game is designed to test your speed and accuracy. To get to the top of the leaderboard, you'll need to master each level, anticipate obstacles, and make quick decisions. Can you beat the clock and be the best? Give it your best shot, Good luck gamers!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tips:

After you've contacted with the Table of each level(3 levels currently in the game(with the tutorial is 4)) u chose to go to the next levle(by waitin for 5 sec) or restart to get a better score(F1)
